title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Group Camp
body: Bandy Creek Group Camp       The Bandy Creek Group Camp is open from April 1 through November 15. Reservations can be made up to one year in advance by calling 1-877-444-6777 or online at www.recreation.gov. There are two areas that can be reserved. Each contains a bathhouse, pavillion with a large grill and a campfire circle. Area E-1 has 19 sites and Area E-2 has 16 sites. Both areas have handicapped accessibility sites. Group camp areas are $100 per night for up to 25 persons. It is $3 for each additional person.
